includedAssets.title: Silence And Suffering
includedAssets.synopsis: As Spector and Rose are rushed to hospital, Gibson desperately prays for the killer to survive and face justice.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Spector and Rose are rushed to hospital, Gibson desperately prays for the killer to survive and face justice.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Spector and Rose are rushed to hospital, Gibson desperately prays for the killer to survive and face justice.

includedAssets.title: His Troubled Thoughts
includedAssets.synopsis: Even though Spector is finally within her reach, Gibson finds herself under intense scrutiny for her handling of the case.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Even though Spector is finally within her reach, Gibson finds herself under intense scrutiny for her handling of the case.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Even though Spector is finally within her reach, Gibson finds herself under intense scrutiny for her handling of the case.

includedAssets.title: The Gates Of Light
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep3 - The Gates Of Light
includedAssets.synopsis: Sally Ann takes drastic action as the police shift their attention towards her. Meanwhile, Spector grows closer to his nurse.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sally Ann takes drastic action as the police shift their attention towards her. Meanwhile, Spector grows closer to his nurse.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sally Ann takes drastic action as the police shift their attention towards her. Meanwhile, Spector grows closer to his nurse.

includedAssets.title: The Hell Within Him
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep4 - The Hell Within Him
includedAssets.synopsis: As Sally-Ann tries to find a way out, Gibson battles to make sure Spector stands trial for his crimes.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Sally-Ann tries to find a way out, Gibson battles to make sure Spector stands trial for his crimes.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Sally-Ann tries to find a way out, Gibson battles to make sure Spector stands trial for his crimes.

includedAssets.title: Wounds Of Deadly Hate
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep5 - Wounds Of Deadly Hate
includedAssets.synopsis: The police look into the 2002 murder of a woman in London, uncovering more details about Spector's troubled past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The police look into the 2002 murder of a woman in London, uncovering more details about Spector's troubled past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The police look into the 2002 murder of a woman in London, uncovering more details about Spector's troubled past.

includedAssets.title: Their Solitary Way
includedAssets.synopsis: Just as Gibson feels the net has closed around Spector, an unexpected twist turns the case on its head. Series finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Just as Gibson feels the net has closed around Spector, an unexpected twist turns the case on its head. Series finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Just as Gibson feels the net has closed around Spector, an unexpected twist turns the case on its head. Series finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: As Spector fights for his life in hospital, Gibson battles with internal affairs to ensure he faces justice. Climactic third series of the tense British-Irish crime thriller starring Gillian Anderson and Jamie Dornan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Spector (Jamie Dornan) fights for his life, Gibson (Gillian Anderson) battles to ensure justice. Third series of the tense British-Irish thriller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Spector fights for his life in hospital, Gibson battles with internal affairs to ensure he faces justice. Climactic third series of the tense British-Irish crime thriller starring Gillian Anderson and Jamie Dornan.

includedIn.title: The Fall
includedIn.synopsis: While a Met superintendent travels to Northern Ireland to investigate a murder, the killer meticulously plans his next crime.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: While a Met superintendent travels to Northern Ireland to investigate a murder, the killer meticulously plans his next crime.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: While a Met superintendent travels to Northern Ireland to investigate a murder, the killer meticulously plans his next crime.
